Liono: Man I hate being the Only good fraction and having no backup ::slides 
out of nemesis sword range and grabs Nemesis using him a shield blocking the 
attacks:: 

Tigerhawk: Liono Call the retreat command it our only Choice

Liono: ::Comlink:: Maximals I know tried and I know we are barely hanging to 
Gather and this is not one of our better days and some of you are my friends 
and loved ones
and I'm not going to let you die here All those who want to run help those 
that can't escape may Go I'll stay and Buy you some time to escape the 
attack. ::End transmission:: ::Runs picks up tocra and puts him in the Cr:: 
::Exits base::
Let the line be Drawn here ::Draw swords:: I'm going to Stop you no matter 
what the cost Hellbeast Zardus The Freak show that starts with and O I'm over 
here come get some  This is going to hurt alot
